TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewEditMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how a user starts cell editing in the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
All <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> values except for EditProgrammatically allow a user to double-click a cell to begin editing it.
## Examples The following code example illustrates the use of this type. For more information, see [How to: Specify the Edit Mode for the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-specify-the-edit-mode-for-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#067](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#067)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#067](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#067)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode EditOnEnter = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Editing begins when the cell receives focus. This mode is useful when pressing the TAB key to enter values across a row, or when pressing the ENTER key to enter values down a column.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode EditOnF2 = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Editing begins when F2 is pressed while the cell has focus. This mode places the selection point at the end of the cell contents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode EditOnKeystroke = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Editing begins when any alphanumeric key is pressed while the cell has focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode EditOnKeystrokeOrF2 = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Editing begins when any alphanumeric key or F2 is pressed while the cell has focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode EditProgrammatically = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Editing begins only when the method is called.
